articles.title: A new study has confirmed it: an egg actually does choose the sperm - Kidspot
articles.description: If the egg likes a sperm, it's chemicals tell it to swim faster ... If it doesn't, it sends out signals to encourage it to put on the breaks. It's like the genetic equivalent of ghosting.
